entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 5:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 46 %
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
